Test Name: Cystic Fibrosis and Spinal Muscular Atrophy (CF/SMA) Carrier Screen Panel
Purpose: To detect CFTR mutations and SMN1 deletions for carrier screening of cystic fibrosis and spinal muscular atrophy.
Container: EDTA tube for blood or validated saliva/buccal swab collection device
Equipment: Thermal cycler for PCR, capillary electrophoresis system or next-generation sequencing platform
